word:
Let no time be wasted, but do not overwork. Teach the truth as it is in Jesus. When the power of truth is felt in the soul, the principles of truth will be brought into the daily life. Then true godliness will  appear.--Letter 66, 1911, p. 3. (To Brother and Sister Haskell, August 28, 1911.) 

Released June 21, 1978.
